this package is for separating numbers for better display
for example:
10000 ----> 10,000
129000.89 ---> 129,000.89

to import the pack 

just use:
import NumSeparator

perform separation
------------------

separated = NumSeparator.separate(numbers = 1000.38)
print(separated)

output: 1,000.38
